attributes.action: Shamima Begum ISIS supporter now pregnant, wishes to return to the UK. Stop this
attributes.additional_details:
Critics says her lack of remorse proves she is a radical and potential danger to Britain, who should be barred from returning or arrested and prosecuted at the very least. 

Dr Kim Howells, a former Foreign Office and Counter-Terrorism Minister under Tony Blair and Gordon Brown, said today that Begum shouldn't be let back into the country - but will use her baby to get in.
attributes.background:
Shamima Begum, 19, fled Bethnal Green for Syria with two friends.   
She married a Dutch jihadi within days, had 2 children who died and is nine months pregnant with third child. She wishes to return to the UK to take advantage of our National healthcare System
